item.description:
Grab your jogging shoes and come support our local JA students by participating in the Junior Achievement 5K Challenge and Fun Run! Runners of all ages will gather Saturday, April 9, 2011 for a fun trip around Forest Park running for Western Massachusetts' students' financial literacy. JA Readiness Run will support Junior Achievement programs in Western Massachusetts. JA programs financial literacy, work readiness and entrepreneurial programs for students grades K-12.

This is the first time this race is being run (pun intended)! There is also a 1 mile walk at 9:15am.

Registration is $20 and you can register online at www.active.com until April 7th. Race Day Registration is $25 and starts at 8am.

Children 12 and under are free.

All proceeds support JA programs in local communities and schools.

To find out more or to register visit www.jawm.org or www.active.com

You can email Katie at khawkins@jawm.org or call at 413-747-7670.

Race volunteers are also still needed, so if you can't run, and still want to help out, please contact Katie.
item.why: This is the first time this race is being run and the race director is a customer of mine.
item.name: JA "Readiness" Run
